dateDescription: La data dell'evento, o la prima occorrenza se l'intervallo è impostato. Il formato è GD-MM-AAAA o GG/MM/AAAA.
timeDescription: L'ora dell'evento. Il formato è HH:mm (24 ore di orologio). Il tempo è UTC+0 in inverno, UTC+1 in estate.
descriptionDescription: La descrizione dell'evento, per le newlines di tipo \n.
intervalDescription: L'intervallo in cui questo evento deve ripetersi.
intervalOneBeforeLastFridayOfTheMonth: Every one before last friday of the month
roleToPingDescription: A role to ping when the event is created.
channelDescription: The channel in which the event be should posted, if omitted the current channel is used.
leaderDescription: The event leader for this event, defaults to yourself if not provided.
bannerDescription: The banner image, shown below the event embed and in the Discord server event banner.
variantDescription: The variant of the event, used to distinguish between different types of events.
listDescription: List all currently known events and their IDs. Future scheduled events will not be listed.
eventIdDescription: The command id, use /event list to get a list, or type the event name for autocomplete.
removeParticipantDescription: Manually remove a participant from an event.
participantDescription: The participant to remove, use @mention or type the name for autocomplete.
checksNoParticipantsFound: {{REDCROSS}} No participants found for the event {{eventName}}.
checksNotAParticipant: {{REDCROSS}} {{participantMention}} was not a participant for the event {{eventName}}.
removeParticipantSuccessful: {{GREENTICK}} Successfully removed participant {{participantMention}} from the event {{eventName}}.
paramsInvalidDateFormat: {{REDCROSS}} The date you provided is invalid, it has to be in the format of {{DD-MM-YYY, inlineCode}} or {{DD/MM/YYYY, inlineCode}}.
paramsInvalidTimeFormat: {{REDCROSS}} The time you provided is invalid, it has to be in the format of {{HH:mm, inlineCode}} (24 hour clock). Time is UTC+0 in winter, UTC+1 in summer.
paramsInvalidChannel: {{REDCROSS}} The channel you provided is invalid, it has to be a valid channel mention or ID.
checksChannelPermissions: {{REDCROSS}} I do not have permission to send messages in the specified channel. I need at least the {{viewChannel, inlineCode}}, {{sendMessages, inlineCode}}, and {{embedLinks, inlineCode}} permissions.
createUnexpectedError: {{REDCROSS}} An unexpected error occurred while creating the event. Contact support for assistance.
createSuccessful: {{GREENTICK}} Successfully created the event {{eventName}} with ID {{eventId}}.
checksNoEventFoundWithId: {{REDCROSS}} No event found with the ID {{eventId}}.
listContentTooLong: {{GREENTICK}} The event list is too long to send in a single message. Here is a file with the event list:
deleteUnexpectedError: {{REDCROSS}} An unexpected error occurred while deleting the event. Contact support for assistance.
